attributes.action: Launch a public enquiry into the Iraq invasion and war by 2010
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British public and parliament were given specific reasons as to why we should go to war with Iraq. Assurances such as that Iraq was a known harbourer of Al Qaeda and that it had weapons of mass destruction turned out to be not at all accurate. We are now faced with the situation of a country still in tatters and our forces fighting a war for totally different reasons for why we invaded. The British public deserve to know why.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Launch a public enquiry into the Iraq invasion and war by 2010."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20341


Prime Minister's Office
